body.name: ADATA Elite UE800 1TB USB Type-C USB 3.2 Gen2 Flash Drive Up to 1000MB/s Read/Write (AELI-UE800-1T-CSG), Competible with iPhone 15 Pro Series/Android/Playstation 5
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 54 mins

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 21 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specification Seamless file transfers with USB 3.2 Gen2, Up to 1000MB/s read/write, USB Type-C support for high compatibilit.

Super Strength With USB 3.2 Gen2 and bandwidth up to 10Gb/s, plug and play the UE800 to read and write files, large and small, in an instant. What's more, it's backward compatible with USB 2.0 devices.
Speed Level Up The compact UE800 features read/write speeds of up to 1,000MB/s, which is 10 times faster than the average USB 3.2 Gen1 drive.

Make it Easy with USB Type-C No matter upside-down or right-side-up, you'll plug it in right every time with a USB Type-C connector. What's more, USB Type-C is compatible with a wide range of devices, from PCs, laptops, smartphones, to tablets, for hassle-free usage.
Capless Convenience The UE800 features a sliding connector design that does away with cumbersome covers or caps that can be lost. The connector can be easily extended or retracted with just one hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use with a PC gaming handheld, a Legion Go. Already type-C, easy to use with modern mobile hardware. Can use it with iPhone 15 or Android phones without an adapter. I expected that there would be speed degradation in sustained loads that would saturate any fast cache on the drive. That would be fine as all I wanted was something better than overpriced microSD cards that drop to like 10MB/s under any load. This at worst is like 80MB/s.The early burst will sustain about 1GB/s for a bit but then drop. Then it'll go to some troughs and peaks. Just now in my testing moving moving about 100 GB of data, it's mostly at 130MB/s and random moments of 230-300MB/s. That is better than I expected. Okay now it's gone down to 60MB/s. Now with videos maybe average size like 8GB moving over 100GB in total at a time, this maintains about 120-200MB/s through most of it. Maybe it too hot. Doesn't feel too hot to touch like some NVME in enclosures that I've felt. Flash drives are inconsistent than an m.2 in an enclosure but we pay for the size and convenienceSo much better and consistent than microSD cards in similar price brackets. Random read/write on my 1TB microSD card sucks compared to this in CrystalDiskMark. I'm playing games off this flash drive that on Steam, have files that some total to over 100GB. My microSD card has little load time hitches in games. This flash drive, so much better than a spinning disk. The glory of good flash storage and random access performance. Sure there's going to be modern games with DirectStorage that aren't perfect, but I've watched videos of the PS5 Ratchet and Clank on SATA3 drives and it's still way better than spinning disk.I approve of this flash drive. Black Friday 2023 2TB at $103

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this flash drive works great but the side push button is the worst it doesn't stay strong when pull the pin out and want to insert it into a laptop or a phone, you need to hold it strong and insert the drive. it's kind of tricky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Legit speed and size, cheap case
reviews.reviewText: Just tested the thumbdrive with CrystalDiskMark. Size is 1863 GiB (2000 GB), read speed is >1000 GB/s, write speed is ~970 GB/s. The case is rather flimsy, and the USB-C extender seems like it'd be prone to break. But as for the actual specs, they appear correct.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MOST FLATLINE constant speed have seen!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing constant speed! I only got around 37 gigabytes per second because my laptop has a low grade usb-c. But when I get a new laptop it should be much better.Great quality metal flash drive! Open up and click it to expose the usb-c, and it’s sturdy as it goes into the laptop.Definitely will be hard to lose this one, since my other flash drives were so small and get lost frequently

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for a day or two then speeds dropped
reviews.reviewText: It worked well for a few days then speed dropped to less than 100 MB/s. Maybe my individual unit is defective unfortunately...tried reformatting but no luck...will have to return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working great with my iPhone 15 Pro Max!
reviews.reviewText: Works great with my iPhone 15 Pro Max! Super fast and works great as an external drive for recording 4k PRORES video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Drive is fast but may be too wide for ports in Macbooks
reviews.reviewText: Biggest issue for MacBooks is the physical size of this drive: it's width does not allow it to be plugged in next to your charging cable in the neiboring usb-c port (see attached pic, this is true for both 4-port MB pro 16-in and MB air)So you may need a usb-c male / female cable if you want it to plug it in next to your other / power cable.The drive build looks to be flaky with very light/plastic feel (so would def need to be very careful with it).Other than that, drive looked fast, consistentently writing at 300MB/s for prolonged periods when backing up large documents/pictures/etc folders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality, value and price!
reviews.reviewText: Very fast drive and excellent capacity Vs Price. A very good deal from a very good company.
